thread.title: Medeama wonder kid Kwesi Donsu eyes more glory next season
thread.title_full: Medeama wonder kid Kwesi Donsu eyes more glory next season

title: Medeama wonder kid Kwesi Donsu eyes more glory next season
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 10:40 CET Medeama wonder kid Kwesi Donsu eyes more glory next season - www.ghanasoccernet.com Medeama SC midfielder Kwesi Donsu 
Highly talented Medeama midfielder Kwesi Donsu says he is remaining grounded despite a breakthrough season with the Tarkwa based club. 
Donsu, was rewarded as the best player in the just ended MTN FA cup where his side won the trophy at the expense of heavy favorites Asante Kotoko. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
